name: places/ChIJp1X87Af0wokRzG592ynirVc
formattedAddress: 19 Vermilyea Ave, New York, NY 10034, USA
adrFormatAddress: 19 Vermilyea Ave, New York, NY 10034, USA

originalText.text: Honestly this is not a good dentist & I would never recommend to anyone. It is located inside of an apartment building. It Does not look clean inside or outside. The dentist was very late to the appointment. He Barely looked at my teeth. My molars needed fillings replaced and the dentist said they didn’t need it, when I can clearly see that my previous fillings are gone! RED FLAG! He did a very quick & rough cleaning which felt like he didn’t do anything at all. Didn’t even offer me a napkin to wipe the fluoride off of my face. The dentist equipment did not look clean at all. It’s only 1 small exam room, When you are in the room, the door is left cracked open and everyone in the waiting room can hear your business. I did not like my experience and I would never return. If you are in search of a new dentist, I suggest that you 100% skip this place!! I should’ve left as soon as I entered & seen the establishment!

originalText.text: I was a patient of Sherman Dental Associates since I was a little kid. Years later, doctors and location changed. Dr. Bernstein ended up being my dentist. I always felt like he didn't take me seriously. He failed to listen to my concern and treat me accordingly. I complained about gum bleeding to which he didn't give me the proper advice. Then I ended up with periodontitis which he didn't diagnose. I didn't like the treatment I was getting at this clinic so I changed dentist to another clinic. On my first visit, the new dentist told me right away that I have severe case of periodontist. Periodontitis doesn't happen overnight. If only Dr. Bernstein had cared and looked into my teeth and gum problems earlier, this could have been prevented. of all the times I was seen my Dr. Bernstein, I don't know how he didn't see that I had gum disease. This doctor ruined my teeth and smile forever.

originalText.text: The fastest and careless cleaning I ever had. The dentist barely did anything, literally took 1 minute. Seems not to care at all. Would not come back here. Not recommended.
